WorkPlace.Name: COPENHAGEN INFO ApS
WorkPlace.Description:
Copenhagen Info is a privatly owned company, providing touristinformation to the visitors of Copenhagen. 

Our ambition is to be present where the tourists are already. We are located on Strøget, Langelinie and we also greet the tourists with our mobile bike units.
WorkPlace.OrganizationDescription: Who are we? Copenhagen Info is a private tourist information centre with locations on Strøget and the central station. Our motto is “the good experience”, for our staff, our partners and of course for the tourists.

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Red Sightseeing is part of Tours & Tickets Copenhagen, a subsidiary company of Tourism Group International. Red Sightseeing provides Hop-on Hop-off bus services for visitors in Copenhagen. Tourism Group International is active in Copenhagen, Amsterdam, Rotterdam, Berlin and Stockholm, and owns and operates a diverse portfolio of attractions.

 

We are now looking for Outdoor Sales Representatives (full time/part-time) for the 2022 season, who want to work in a fast-growing tourism organization and be part of a great team that works hard together to ensure that visitors in Copenhagen experience our city in a smooth, fun, and safe way!

 

As an Outdoor Sales Representative, you will be responsible for selling our products and providing information to our customers. We set high focus on providing great service and experience beyond customer expectations. You will be positioned at various locations throughout the city, as well as at cruise docks on the days we have incoming cruises.

 

As a person, you are outgoing, flexible, solutions-oriented and enjoy working at a fast pace. You have a good eye for service and are not afraid to step up when needed. You have no problem working independently and enjoy working in a team just as much.

 

We would love to hear from you if:

 

  • You love Copenhagen and want to become part of our international team
  • You like to work outdoors at the most beautiful sights of Copenhagen
  • You speak English fluently and Danish or German, Spanish, French, Italian, Portuguese, Russian, Chinese, or Japanese 
  • You are motivated and have a service-oriented work attitude
  • You are communicative, outgoing and enjoy providing great experience to customers

Requirements: 

  • You must be 18 years of age and have a clean criminal record
  • You can present a valid residence / work permit in Denmark

We expect our candidates to be ready to start in April! So, are you ready to work in an exciting industry where you meet people from all over the world? Then don't hesitate to send us your application! We offer a base salary of 140 Kkr pr. Hour
